banque_postale.title: Banque Postale du Congo
banque_postale.description: Website for the Banque Postale du Congo. Responsive and modern website to present the bank's services and products.

itic_paris.title: Fullstack Developer / Mentor
itic_paris.description: Design of the ITIC COMPANION application, a school gamification tool connected to the Ymag Ypareo ERP. Technical mentoring of students from BTS to Master level and implementation of a documented microservices architecture for the digital campus.
missions: Design and development of the ITIC COMPANION application with Vue.js and Spring Boot
API integration with Ymag Ypareo ERP for student data synchronization
Implementation of a gamification system (points, badges, rankings)
Technical mentoring of students from BTS to Master (20+ students)
Microservices architecture with Docker and Kubernetes
Complete technical documentation and team training
achievements: Training of 20+ students in development best practices

xksgroup.title: Tech Lead / Project Manager
xksgroup.description: Technical supervision of projects and design of robust architectures. Code review, technical debt management, and support for developers in a logic of quality and scalability.
missions: Technical direction of 3 simultaneous projects with teams of 5-8 developers
Systematic code review and implementation of quality standards
Architecture of scalable solutions on AWS
Technical debt management and strategic refactoring
Technical coaching of junior and mid-level developers
Implementation of CI/CD with GitLab CI and deployment automation

faseya.title: Backend Tech Lead
faseya.description: Backend design and development on AWS with a focus on performance and security. Technical supervision of the team and implementation of good development and deployment practices.
missions: Backend microservices architecture on AWS (Lambda, ECS, RDS)
API performance optimization (70% reduction in response times)
Security implementation (OAuth2, JWT, rate limiting)
Supervision of a team of 4 backend developers
Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
Monitoring and alerting with CloudWatch and Datadog
achievements: Zero downtime over 4 months of production

nanocreatives.title: Tech Lead / Project Manager
nanocreatives.description: Technical direction and coordination of web projects. Cloud deployment, CI/CD, and team supervision in an agile environment, ensuring reliability and quality of deliverables.
missions: Technical direction of web projects for international clients
Implementation of CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions
Multi-provider cloud deployment (AWS, GCP, DigitalOcean)
Training and supervision of agile teams (Scrum)
Estimation and planning of complex projects
Client relations and management of technical expectations
achievements: Training of 2 teams in agile methodologies

unfpa.title: IT Consultant
unfpa.description: Implementation of the GLPI platform for IT asset management. Needs analysis, system configuration, and user training as part of an IS modernization project.
missions: Analysis of IT asset management needs
Installation and configuration of GLPI on Linux infrastructure
Configuration of ticket workflows and inventory
Data migration from the old system
Training of 15 users in GLPI
Complete documentation in French and English

agrer.title: Developer Consultant
agrer.description: Development of an agricultural monitoring application funded by the European Union. Team coordination and training of more than 300 users to improve field data collection and analysis.
missions: Development of Flutter mobile application for agricultural data collection
REST API with Laravel for cloud synchronization
Analytical dashboard with Vue.js for data visualization
Coordination of a team of 4 developers
Training of 300+ field users in the mobile application
Technical support and maintenance for 6 months
achievements: 80% improvement in the quality of collected data
